text.title: Pool Mural
text.subtitle: Our largest bedroom with a mural of the jungle

features.name: Two Double Beds.
features.description: Spacious bedroom with two double beds (140cm x 200cm) and mosquito netting.

features.name: Luxury Bathroom Suite.
features.description: Glowing onyx vanity and a separate shower for a premium experience.

features.name: Outdoor Bathtub Under Vines.
features.description: Stunning private bathtub surrounded by lush vines and nature.

features.name: Spacious Work Area.
features.description: Long working desk with two chairs for a productive stay.

features.name: Climate & Smart Comfort.
features.description: Air conditioning, dehumidifier, Sonos speaker, charging station, and security box.
